forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 86. West wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 63. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. Southwest wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze between 9am and 1pm, then areas of smoke between 1pm and 5pm, then haze. Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. Southwest wind 5 to 15 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 7pm, then areas of smoke between 7pm and 9pm, then haze between 9pm and 11pm, then areas of smoke. Mostly clear, with a low around 65. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
